author: Tony Tobin
method: Place the fresh tuna in a bowl with the soy sauce, lime juice and clear honey and leave to marinate for three minutes. Drain the tuna. Fry the tuna slices in olive oil in a small non-stick frying pan for 1-2 minutes on both sides. Add the marinade for the last minute to warm through. Place all the remaining ingredients in a serving bowl and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve the tuna on top of the salad and drizzle over the juices from the pan.
ingredients: 85g/3oz fresh tuna, sliced,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 lime, juice only,  1 tbsp clear honey,  1 tbsp olive oil,  5 radishes, grated,  2 tbsp radish leaves, finely chopped,  1 tsp caster sugar,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
